title: Killed Again, Mr. Detective - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Mystery   Romance   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Detectives   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Immortals   Kuudere   Male Protagonist   Slow Romance   Weak to Strong
author: Teniwoha
description: Sakuya Otsuki, an immortal high school detective who somehow revives no matter how many times he is killed. He was killed by a criminal because of his innate humor, and while being seen by his excellent assistant Lilithea with cold eyes, he challenges a number of difficult cases based on the clues he brought back from the bottom of his death!>
